page.title: 19CLUBS IN THE LYTHE AREA
page.content:
A number of clubs and organisations exist in the Lythe area. Those affiliated to National Organisations are:- {Womens Institute.}which meets monthly in the Village Hall. {Guides}who hold weekly meetings in the school during term time. {Brownies}who hold similar meetings to the Guides. {Mothers Union }who meet twice weekly. {Young Farmers}who meet at Ugthorpe every two weeks except in summer. Other clubs in Lythe are:- {Cycling Club }with weekly meetings in summer. {Cricket Club}meeting weekly in season. {Football Club}with regular matches and meetings in the season.
{ }
